Author: Renlywinsthethrone
Text: My absolute worst binges are when I'm cooking something (especially something that requires a long time in the oven)  and I end up tasting it, just to check seasonings/doneness, or I much on scraps of ingredients, or I otherwise try to have "just a tiny snack" while I'm waiting for my meal to cook. I end up eating everything in the kitchen, crying and feeling terrible but then my food finishes cooking so I eat it too anyway because dammit I can't let this all have been for nothing, and then since I've already eaten the whole kitchen and my meal just fuck everything I'll go out and buy/order even more food it's binge time baby I'm making the most of it

Author: saturninelys
Text: YES. All the time, and there is absolutely *nothing* makes me feel worse :(
